code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Signup(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert("User registered: ".concat(name));navigate("/vastu");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"User Registration"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,style:{maxWidth:"300px",width:"100%"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:"100%",padding:"0.5rem",marginBottom:"1rem"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:"100%",padding:"0.5rem",marginBottom:"1rem"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:"100%",padding:"0.5rem",marginBottom:"1rem"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"primary-button",children:"Register"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{marginTop:"1rem"},children:["Already registered?"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"link-button",onClick:()=>navigate("/login"),children:"Login here"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"secondary-button",onClick:()=>navigate("/vastu"),style:{marginTop:"1rem"},children:"Next: Vastu Page"})]});}
